notes: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.
It is used to create and structure the content of web pages.

questions.question: What is the purpose of HTML?
questions.correctAnswer: To create and structure content on web pages

notes: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.
It is used for styling and formatting web pages.

questions.question: What is the primary use of CSS?
questions.correctAnswer: To style and format web pages

notes: JavaScript is a programming language used for web development.
It enables interactive and dynamic content on web pages.

questions.question: What is JavaScript primarily used for?
What does JavaScript enable on web pages?
